评论详情: I did not realize from the product description that the top layer of the dress (the gray part) is actually entirely lace therefore entirely transparent!  Thankfully, they included a short, thin black slip for underneath.  Size fits great and it seems like a quality product.  Pairs very cute with warm leggings and even a long-sleeved shirt underneath during the winter with some cute combat boots! Definitely recommend.

Overall, this is a nice dress, very playful.  My biggest objection: the collar is sewn as though the front of the dress is intended for the back. I noticed in the review photos that a lot of people choose to wear these with the V-side on the front. Having tried it on, I realize it's because the front panel is measured so it feels awkward and tight across the throat, making that the only comfortable way to wear it.

评论概述: love the dress but oh boy the color is way off
评论详情: I got the burgundy color one in a small , i wish they had it in xs small as its still a bit large , especially the slip , I have tiny boobs and the slip barely covers them on the sides . its alright as I will just wear something else underneath .  Coming to the color , its pink , almost a hot pink instead of that nice darker red , I happen to like pink so again not a big deal for me but there is a vast difference between color shown and color received
Fits perfectly, live the way I look and feel in it

It does say :Womens Sleeveless Backless Asymmetrical Layered Lace Long Dress with Slip Two PiecesWhat happened to my slip ?  Not worth the money without the slip.  I will return this dress. Also I feel it runs small.  The waist is set too high. On the picture it looks like it sets just below.
Very Cute dress. Runs a size smaller.

I like that the front and back (top) are cut differently so you could flip it around to have the V of the back in the front, if you wanted to. I wish it was longer, but it’s decent quality for the $
I'd think this item as mix of gothic theme with y2k influence. Cute, has lots of folds by the skirt just like the photo. Fabric is little to scratchy. THe inner line dress is too cheap

This dress was not only beautiful but I got so many compliments on it at a recent wedding October 5th 2024.... It is very soft and very flowy... And of course not hot at all I am 62 years old yeah we don't want the heat LOL... I am 97 lb and a small fit me like a glove

评论概述: Exterior dress is gorgeous interior terrible
评论详情: I love the exterior dress and it was wonderful, but I had to go buy and an additional interior address because the interior dress was flimsy and displayed way too much and it was very see-through so be careful. Received a ton of compliments on the exterior dress though so I would definitely buy it again. I bought it for Taylor Swift and it looks a lot like the willow dress.

评论概述: Runs very small, slip is useless
评论详情: Very tight. Tiny armholes.  Definitely size up, maybe twice. Slip is more like a shirt. Material is fine. Plus side: it looks cute when wearing backwards.
This was supposed to come with a slip but was missing when dress arrived.  Color was also more green than gray
Love it it's beautiful

This is a gorgeous dress and it fit me fairly well even though I usually wear a xxs or xs and I only had a little extra room in the waist, but a wide belt fixes that. It’s not too long on my 5’2” frame either! My only complaint is that the slip that it comes with is absolutely MASSIVE (more like a L-XL size) but I was able to purchase a different one in my size and that worked perfectly! Plus that means I could switch out the color under the lace if I wanted a pop of something fun to show through!

Absolutely IN LOVE with it, I bought it with specific jewelry in mind to wear with it and it did not disappoint!!  But definitely buy a different slip, the one that came with it was simultaneously too big and too small at the same time. And I was a little disappointed with the actual skirt part of the dress, it is much thinner and more see through than the pictures let on.  All that said, I still bought a second one in a different color.

I have to return this dress because instead of it being a beige, it’s a yellow white color. Very cream-yellow-esque. Not loving it for my mushroom costume so I sent it back. I had to change my Halloween costume idea. 😅

评论概述: True to size, but not to color.
评论详情: I’m going to start off with the positives and say that I love the way this dress fits! It’s very flattering, true to size (I am 5’4, 206 lbs, and bought a Large) and it complements me in all the right places. I bought it to wear on my upcoming trip to Mexico and it’s going to be perfect to walk around the resort in!  However, it is not true to color. The picture I included is of the “army green” option and it looks almost black. I can see the faintest suggestion of green because I know to look for it, but if I didn’t know to look for it, I’d just think it was black. Kinda disappointing because I’ve been on an earthy green kick lately and really loved the color of the army dress in the advertisement. Oh, well.

I love the dress, it’s beautiful but the package it the dress was actually in, was greasy and dirty and had a foul smell. If I didn’t need the dress right away, I’d send it back. I have to put it in the cleaners. With all that’s going on these days, that package should not have been greasy with a bad smell. Shame on the business, that was Sorry!!!
Fit wonderfully and was super comfy.
Did not fit My body type. I’m very small and this dress just didn’t fit me.

I love this dress; I always get compliments when I wear it. It’s fun to wear too! Very swishy. Pro tip to machine wash the dress, get a netted laundry bag and throw it in with your delicates and tumble dry (still in the bag) on low.
Mine came ripped but thankfully I know how to sew so I just fixed it myself. Just make sure you check it when receiving.

I’m am incredibly sad to say this does not fit like the photo if you’re at all tall. I don’t even consider myself to be that tall, but at 5’8” this dress did not work. The waist sat right below my boobs and flared out there instead of at the hips, making it look incredibly unflattering. I really, really wanted this dress to work, but I think it probably only looks good on women several inches shorter than me.

评论概述: Pretty, stretchy, short waisted, not for busty ladies
评论详情: Very pretty dress, but the waistline is very high.  I’m always a size small, and this- even with the stretch feels too tight/small. Returning and ordering a size up to see if that works. Doesn’t seem to fit well for busty women.
I got this to meet my favorite artist!  I love this dress it’s my favorite color! I used a tank top that was the same color under, and shorts too!

评论概述: Super cute, wish I’d ordered a small!
评论详情: I bought this to wear as a guest to a goth-themed wedding, and it fit the vibe perfectly! I DO wish I’d bought the small instead of the medium though - the material is stretchy and I felt it was still pretty baggy on me - 5’7 135lbs, b cup. I’ll try to post a photo later. I think it may fit better on bustier girls; for me the medium draped almost to my ankles and I’m considered to have pretty long legs! I ended up correcting it with a waist cinch but would’ve loved to wear it on it’s own. Overall, pretty dang cute for the price!

评论概述: Not very slimming around the waist
评论详情: I’m 5‘5“ weigh 135 pounds I bought size medium it fits perfectly. It’s very pretty very lazy. You can wear it with the V-neck or the scoopneck either or without the corset that they recommended is not very flattering around the waist, but the corset is very nice with it. It hides my belly where the waist line sits right above my belly button and without the corset it’s not very slimming.
Going to use as another Halloween costume.

评论概述: Runs small ; very tight in the armholes
评论详情: Be warned that this is very tight in the armholes and very low-cut. The stretchy polyester slip that it comes with feels very cheap, and is very short. The lace dress is pretty and I would love to get it in all the colors, but the armholes are just so tight. I'm worried it will chafe and/or tear when I wear it for hours.
Comfortable and flattering!
Fit well and looked exactly like the pictures. I personally didn't have the problem of the arm holes being painful that some of the other reviews mention but I do have tiny noodle arms.

I'm a whopping 5'4 and the slip is like a tank top on me. Color is WAY off. I ordered green and it's definitely closer to blue, like teal. I'm not particularly busty and the chest was tight on me as well. Gorgeous dress, but just way too many issues.

I love the fabric and color, and the fit is decent, but I have large bust. The neckline on me shows off way to much cleavage to wear to the even I bought it for.  Since I love it so much, I’ll be getting a different slip or possibly bodysuit to wear underneath to make it more acceptable.  On the flip side I could wear it to a club or party with the slip it came with without any raised eyebrows.  If the slip fit better and j didn’t need to buy an additional piece it’d be 5 stars.The takeaway is, if you’re large chested, maybe plan on finding your own undergarment instead of depending on the slip it comes with.

评论概述: Very nice to wear, but definitely requires the slip. (potentially confusing to wear)
评论详情: The dress is essentially double-layered lace that offers only the barest amount of mystery unless the included (or another) slip is worn with it.  That said, when worn with the slip, it does not feel slutty, and only moderately sexy (though perhaps that's my lack of self-esteem).  Whatever feeling I have while wearing it, I like.I have not had problems with the lace catching on things, but that's more from mindfulness than anything else.  I think the lace is well-made enough.  I ordered in a size that stretches *just* right for my body (a miracle, given I am essentially a rectangular prism that only dreams of hourglasses), and have not seen any stressed threads so far.  I think it will be worth the 40usd I paid for it, especially as I'm not one to dispose of clothing unless it becomes too worn to wear or repair.Regarding the confusion, I looked at the pictures, and there doesn't seem to be agreement with which side the front is.  I'll say that I wore it with the "V" in back but, again, I don't have much up top.
I Love this dress!! So Pretty, love the lacy layers it’s fun & whimsical!!

I wanted to love this dress but it seems so cheap. It reminds me of halloween costume quality. There's a seam right down the middle of the front of the dress and the slip underneath is really cheap material. It could have been way better.

I have bought this dress in black and ivory, most likely from other sellers. When I bought from this seller it was shorter than pictured and didn't look as good as the other dresses I bought, so I returned it.
It’s almost like it’s supposed to be worn backwards but then the slip shows
This fit exactly as expected and is so so pretty. I can't wait to wear it!
I love it!!  Very pretty and comfortable!!

I wore this dress to the Vegas GAGA show. At 120° I stayed cool but looked extra classy. Only thing is it’s a little high in the neck and just a bit tight in the arm seams, but not uncomfortably so. You could use this dress as a base for many different styles depending on your accessories and shoes. Definitely a great buy.

Very cheap fabric. Not worth the price. Returning it. Also who ever made it cut the top backwards so that if you wear it with the lower part in the back like the picture the top of shoulders bunch weird. If you wear the dress as a V neck it works ok but the back seam is very noticeable when you wear it backwards.

The lace and construction was cheap compared to two other lace dresses I bought at the same time for half the price at Wal Mart.  While mine actually did ship with a slip, it was far too short and another slip will need to be purchased.
What’s up with the sizing? Doll clothes - returned I’m 5’3” 107# usually a size xs 0-2 - ordered a small fit like a toddler’s dress

i like it nice fit

I love this dress. It would look good on anyone. It has no lining and is just lace so can be layered with practically anything, as much or as little as you want! The material has some stretch to it and the flowing style is very flattering. I would definitely recommend hand washing and hang drying.

It arrived right on time. It’s super comfortable and flowy, it’s also very versatile and can go without any variety of styles! I don’t normally wears dresses and this just made me feel cuter and feminine which is rare!

Everything is fine except that I missing the slip on with adjustable straps. At first I had thought maybe I misread something and thought it came with when it doesn’t? No further reading it claims that it comes with it, well it never came I only got the outer dress.
There was only a lace piece in the package. No under dress and it is advertised for 2 pieces. I have a photo shoot today!
I’m 5’6” 120lbs…this made me feel so pretty and got a few compliments. I wore it with ankle boots…but you could even wear with leggings.
So pretty! Fits great! I am wearing a nursing dress under that matches perfectly.  It does come with a white slip/tank

This dress was a big win for me!  Got it for an upcoming cello concert I’ll be playing. Needed a dress that is not restricting any arm/shoulder movement, and has a wide and long enough skirt so I can sit with my knees open to play the cello.  It’s one of those you’ll look at in the packaging and immediately go “oh boy…” but it is actually really pretty when you put it on, great quality for the price, has just the right amount of stretch to feel secure but not fragile, and is COMFORTABLE! The lace is soft (not like some other scratchy feeling laces) and the length just brushes above my ankles at the longest parts of the skirt. The slip is very short (my butt hangs out) but the skirt part of the dress is not see through, so it makes a great (and soft) under-layer.  Sizing matches well to my usual sizes, I’m 5’8 190 lbs, 36DD, and the XL fit perfectly.  Now if it just had pockets… 😂🤣😂

This dress is off the chain. I never expected it to be so nice for the price. You could wear it to a dinner party or anywhere. The lace is so pretty and soft to the touch. Thank you I love it.

This dress is awesome... my daughter loved it and fit wonderfully!!! It's comfortable and the slip that come with it was perfect !!!
The dress is great. It was just a bit small. I usually wear a large and I ordered an extra large and it is tight.

评论概述: Nice but watch the sizing due to construction
评论详情: Nice little grunge dress, if you’ve got any kind of a belly though, it’s not gonna fit you very well around the waist because of the way that the lace over laying dress is stitch. But it still looks nice.

The dress is very pretty, and the burgundy color is rich and vibrant.  But quality is questionable.  It's very stretchy, but delicate, so you have to be careful with how you handle it.  It snags easily.  Also, order one size up, because if you wear it too tight, it will stretch the fabric too much and will end up breaking the fibers.  It's better that it's a little loose, or that it will not be stretched excessively.  I ordered one size up, I was concerned with it not fitting my chest.  And it barely fits without forcing the dress to stretch.  I am a 38D/40C, I got the XL.  Fit a little loose on the waist but it was just barely right over my chest.  It still looks really nice.  If you keep these issues in mind, it should be a nice dress.  Not sure how long it will last.

评论概述: This will be a fav dress!
评论详情: Dress is so pretty!It can be worn with or without a top underneath and can be worn rounded neck which is front or V-neck which is back, like in my pics!Both ways look right, your preference is all that needed!Comes with adjustable strap short dress length cami slip, which I didn’t wear! I wanted to wear my mesh top underneath!I got so many compliments!For Spring I will wear it with the rounded neck side, the slip underneath instead of top and a black sheer shawl to cover my arms.So in love and so happy I got it!

评论概述: Slip underneath is flimsy, dress is beautiful
评论详情: I purchased the olive/brown color. The slip that goes underneath is black, and is extremely flimsy to the point that it almost puckers and doesn’t lay correctly. However, the exterior and lace part of the dress is completely separate and it is absolutely beautiful. I like the outer layer so much that I am going to be looking for a different layer to replace the one underneath.
Beautiful lace dress.  Looks great for casual or more formal occasions.  Layers well for cooler temperatures.  I would suggest sizing once as the dress is very form fitting.
Had to return. Waist was way too high and not at waist
I love this dress!  It runs true to size, and is very flattering.  Looks great to ankle boots.  Highly recommend.
